mapper.sql: VISIT_NO, PATIENT_ID, NAME, NAME_PHONETIC, SEX, DATE_OF_BIRTH, MAILING_ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER_HOME, VISIT_DATE, SERIAL_NO, CLINIC_LABEL, FIRST_VISIT_INDICATOR, VISIT_DEPT, DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR, REGISTERING_DAT
mapper.insert: insert into V_ZYY_CLINIC_MASTER (VISIT_NO, PATIENT_ID, NAME, NAME_PHONETIC, SEX, DATE_OF_BIRTH, MAILING_ADDRESS, PHONE_NUMBER_HOME, VISIT_DATE, SERIAL_NO, CLINIC_LABEL, FIRST_VISIT_INDICATOR, VISIT_DEPT, DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR, REGISTERING_DAT) values (#{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namePhonetic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumberHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{clinicLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstVisitIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{visitDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registeringDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

VISIT_NO,
PATIENT_ID,

mapper.update:
update V_ZYY_CLINIC_MASTER
PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME_PHONETIC = #{namePhonetic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATE_OF_BIRTH = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MAILING_ADDRESS = #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUMBER_HOME = #{phoneNumberHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLINIC_LABEL = #{clinicLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRST_VISIT_INDICATOR = #{firstVisitIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VISIT_DEPT = #{visitDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTERING_DAT = #{registeringDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update V_ZYY_CLINIC_MASTER set PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME_PHONETIC = #{namePhonetic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_OF_BIRTH = #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MAILING_ADDRESS = #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER_HOME = #{phoneNumberHome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CLINIC_LABEL = #{clinicLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_VISIT_INDICATOR = #{firstVisitIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VISIT_DEPT = #{visitDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGISTERING_DAT = #{registeringDat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select * from admin.V_ZYY_CLINIC_MASTER where VISIT_DATE=to_date(#{0},'yyyy-MM-DD') and VISIT_NO > #{1}
